about_the_game:
New Spring: Survival is a open world zombie survival and crafting RPG where you are trying to stave off the hordes in a procedurally generated post-apocalypse.


Spend the daytime exploring and scavenging for tools and weapons, and hope that it's enough to protect your base when night falls.

Features

  • Open world. The game engine divides the world into chunks and only keeps the relevant ones in memory, which allows massive map sizes without hogging RAM. 🌎

  • New procedurally generated map to explore for each playthrough. 🎲

  • Non-linear gameplay. Stay near your base and grow your own food, or live like a nomad travelling from town to town to scavenge supplies. There is no "correct" way to play.

  • Detailed building and crafting system. Build barricades and line them with barbed wire that you pulled from the remnants of civilization. Craft anything from a nailed baseball bat to a makeshift radio. 🛠

  • Work on 15+ different skill sets which will increase your chances of surviving. 📚

  • Keep your character's morale in check to gain performance boosts and avoid sinking into post-apoc depression. How you do this is influenced by your character's personality traits. 🎭

  • Learn farming, cooking, brewing and other ways to become self-sustainable. 🌾

  • Keep the streets clean with an AK47 (if you can get your hands on one).

Join our Discord
detailed_description:
New Spring: Survival is a open world zombie survival and crafting RPG where you are trying to stave off the hordes in a procedurally generated post-apocalypse.


Spend the daytime exploring and scavenging for tools and weapons, and hope that it's enough to protect your base when night falls.

Features

  • Open world. The game engine divides the world into chunks and only keeps the relevant ones in memory, which allows massive map sizes without hogging RAM. 🌎

  • New procedurally generated map to explore for each playthrough. 🎲

  • Non-linear gameplay. Stay near your base and grow your own food, or live like a nomad travelling from town to town to scavenge supplies. There is no "correct" way to play.

  • Detailed building and crafting system. Build barricades and line them with barbed wire that you pulled from the remnants of civilization. Craft anything from a nailed baseball bat to a makeshift radio. 🛠

  • Work on 15+ different skill sets which will increase your chances of surviving. 📚

  • Keep your character's morale in check to gain performance boosts and avoid sinking into post-apoc depression. How you do this is influenced by your character's personality traits. 🎭

  • Learn farming, cooking, brewing and other ways to become self-sustainable. 🌾

  • Keep the streets clean with an AK47 (if you can get your hands on one).

Join our Discord

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (tarball installation)
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (tarball installation)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti, Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina, Mojave, High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2012 Mac
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina, Mojave, High Sierra, Sierra, OSX El Capitan, Yosemite
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2015 Mac with dedicated GPU
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

name: New Spring: Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 4850 or Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti, Radeon R7 360
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: New Spring is a open world zombie survival RPG where you spend the daytime exploring and scavenging for tools and weapons, and defend your base when night falls. How long can you stave off the hordes?
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
